Package Extbase\Persistence\QOM

Interface summary

Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_AndInterface Performs a logical conjunction of two other constraints.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_BindVariableValueInterface Evaluates to the value of a bind variable.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_ChildNodeJoinConditionInterface Tests whether the childSelector node is a child of the parentSelector node. A node-tuple satisfies the constraint only if:
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_ComparisonInterface Filters node-tuples based on the outcome of a binary operation.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_ConstraintInterface Filters the set of tuples formed by evaluating the query's sources and the joins between them.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_DynamicOperandInterface An operand whose value can only be determined in evaluating the query.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_JoinConditionInterface Filters the set of node-tuples formed from a join.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_JoinInterface Performs a join between two node-tuple sources.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_LowerCaseInterface Evaluates to the lower-case string value (or values, if multi-valued) of operand.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_NotInterface Performs a logical negation of another constraint.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_OperandInterface An operand to a binary operation specified by a Comparison.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_OrderingInterface Determines the relative order of two rows in the result set by evaluating operand for each.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_OrInterface Performs a logical disjunction of two other constraints.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_PropertyValueInterface Evaluates to the value (or values, if multi-valued) of a property.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_QueryObjectModelConstantsInterface Defines constants used in the query object model.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_QueryObjectModelFactoryInterface A QueryObjectModelFactory creates instances of the JCR query object model.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_QueryObjectModelInterface A query in the JCR query object model.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_SelectorInterface Selects a subset of the nodes in the repository based on node type.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_SourceInterface Evaluates to a set of node-tuples.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_StatementInterface A statement interface. This is not part of the JSR283 specification!
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_StaticOperandInterface An operand whose value can be determined from static analysis of the query, prior to its evaluation.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_UpperCaseInterface Evaluates to the upper-case string value (or values, if multi-valued) of operand.

Class summary

Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_BindVariableValue Evaluates to the value of a bind variable.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_ChildNodeJoinCondition
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_Comparison Filters node-tuples based on the outcome of a binary operation.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_DynamicOperand An operand whose value can only be determined in evaluating the query.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_EquiJoinCondition Tests whether the value of a property in a first selector is equal to the value of a property in a second selector.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_Join Performs a join between two node-tuple sources.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_LogicalAnd Performs a logical conjunction of two other constraints.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_LogicalNot Performs a logical negation of another constraint.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_LogicalOr Performs a logical disjunction of two other constraints.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_LowerCase Evaluates to the lower-case string value (or values, if multi-valued) of operand.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_Operand An operand to a binary operation specified by a Comparison.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_Ordering Determines the relative order of two rows in the result set by evaluating operand for each.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_PropertyValue Evaluates to the value (or values, if multi-valued) of a property.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_QueryObjectModel A query in the JCR query object model.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_QueryObjectModelFactory The Query Object Model Factory
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_Selector Selects a subset of the nodes in the repository based on node type.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_Statement A statement acting as a constraint.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_StaticOperand An operand whose value can be determined from static analysis of the query, prior to its evaluation.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_UpperCase Evaluates to the upper-case string value (or values, if multi-valued) of operand.
